籤詩版本二:
Ke kūpono ka neʻe ʻana o ka hoa paio, ʻaʻole hoʻoholo ka pāʻani ʻeleʻele a keʻokeʻo.
ʻIke mākou a pau i ka lanakila a i ʻole ka lanakila ma muli o ka neʻe hoʻokahi. Pono mākou e aʻo iā mākou iho e hana i nā ʻōlelo paipai maikaʻi.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram o ka hālāwai ʻana me kahi hoa paio.
Maikaʻi ka hoʻohana ʻana i nā kino i nā mea a pau.
解曰: Nā makemake a me nā manaʻo. E like me Go. Lanakila i ka hopena. Manaʻo ʻia e hoʻohana i ka scheming.
籤詩故事一:
◇ ʻO Jiang Wei lāua ʻo Deng Ai ke kaua
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ʻo Jiang Wei (Shu) lāua ʻo Deng Ai (Wei)
Ua hui nā pūʻali ʻelua ma Qishan a hakakā kekahi i kekahi ma ka hoʻokumu ʻana. Ua alo aku na puali Wei a me Shu i na enemi ma ke kahua o Bagua, I ka wa e hakaka ana na puali elua, ua hoolele ae la o Jiang Wei i kona hae me ka hooho, a ua hoololi koke ia ka puali o Bagua i kahua houluulu nahesa loloa, e paa ana ia Deng Ai. Ma hope mai ua hoʻopakele ʻia ʻo ia e Sima Wang.
(Metaphorically, ke kū i kahi kūlana koʻikoʻi, pono ʻoe e hoʻohana i ka naʻauao.)
聖意: Paʻa ka hale, paʻa ka ʻoihana ponoʻī, kūleʻa ka ʻoihana, ʻaʻole i hoʻokuʻikahi ʻia ka male, ʻaʻole ka wahine hele wāwae ma Liujia i ka mahina ʻai, ʻinoʻino nā ʻanuhe silika a me nā holoholona, ​​​​ua ālai ʻia ka ʻimi ʻana, kūpono ka hoʻopiʻi ʻana a he conservative ka neʻe. , nele ka waiwai nalowale, pule ka mai no ka hoomalu ana, conservative ka halekupapau mauna
古人: ʻO Jiang Wei lāua ʻo Deng Ai e kaua ana
